solution_line_template: A group of {group1_size} people is charged ${admission_fee} + ${tour_fee} = ${group1_per_person} each.
A group of {group2_size} people pays ${admission_fee} x {group2_size} = $<<{admission_fee}*{group2_size}={group2_total}>>{group2_total} for the admission.
Thus, the aqua park earns a total of ${group1_total} + ${group2_total} = $<<{group1_total}+{group2_total}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}.
